attributes.review: Too many notifications plus I have  Gen Z love!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: The app is very slow and clunky, just like Trump’s responses. Honestly pretty trash app.
attributes.title: Slow and clunky

attributes.review: The insanely spinning lack-of-progress icon caused me to have an epileptic seizure, nearly killing me. This app is far to dangerous to be in the App Store.
attributes.title: Had a seizure

attributes.review: i downloaded the app in support of our ✨amazing✨ cheeto of a president, but unfortunately the app is so awful that it made me want to book a sky diving trip and then conveniently forget to open my parachute on the way down.
attributes.title: absolutely horrendous

attributes.review: This app stole my information, in so shocked that our amazing president would approve of such an app
attributes.title: Stole my info

attributes.review: I’d never thought I’d see the day we had a orange as our president!! Anyways have a fantastic day!
attributes.title: Marissa❤️
